game.name: Nightmarena
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Nightmarena is a 2D rogue lite turn based fighting game. Carefully analyze enemy attack pattern to figure out the best time and direction to dodge and then fight back with your own skills. After every arena attempt, improve your character and keep fighting until you conquer all the floors.
